casebody.data:
(Township of River Vale-Petitioner) C-393 September Term 2017
079924 Supreme Court of New Jersey. December 8, 2017

IN RE PETITION FOR AUTHORIZATION TO CONDUCT A REFERENDUM ON the WITHDRAWAL OF the BOROUGH OF WOODCLIFF LAKE FROM the PASCACK VALLEY REGIONAL SCHOOL DISTRICT.

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004084-13 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition fox certification is denied.
